comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20111108222336

Steps to reproduce:

I had tried to build FF 7.0.1 with PGO enabled.


Actual results:

A window popped up with a message that the browser cannot connect to http://localhost:8888


Expected results:

Dunno ;-) Certainly there should be something completely different.

comments.text: *** Bug 705097 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
comments.author: mardeg@inbox.ru
comments.creator: mardeg@inbox.ru
stlman@poczta.fm
comments.author: stlman@poczta.fm
comments.text:
Created attachment 576721
Pass the profiled browser 127.0.0.1 instead of localhost.

Localhost cannot be connected because it resolves to ::1 while the profileserver.py binds 127.0.0.1. The two possible solutions are:

1) bind ::1 too
2) pass http://127.0.0.1:8888 URL (tested, works, patch attached)
comments.raw_text:
